message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take a bit more to account for the faster inflation affecting my share.
Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be fairer this time. I understand your share is impacted more by inflation, but this needs to be a mutually beneficial agreement.
Bob, it seems we're at an impasse. I'm offering a slightly modified version of your proposal, recognizing that the value decreases faster for me. This is my final offer.
